summary.long: 3 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text: The Elder, Unto the well-beloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For I rejoiced greatly when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren and to strangers,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: who have borne witness of thy charity before the church. If thou send them forward on their journey in a godly manner, thou shalt do well,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: because for His nameâ€™s sake they went forth, taking nothing from the Gentiles.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellow helpers to the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I wrote unto the church, but Diotrephes, who loveth to have preeminence among them, receiveth us not.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words. And not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth those who would, and casteth them out of the church.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God, but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Demetrius hath good report of all men, and of the truth itself. Yea, of this we also bear record, and ye know that our record is true.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: but I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator
